A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really enjoyed TLJ. I have seen it 3 times now and it’s gotten better each time. I have no issues with Luke’s attitude after failing Ben Solo. Felt natural\, actually. I do have a few minor nitpicks but one major gripe but not that I know about it it doesn’t take away from the film. That nitpick is Leia surviving in space. It just comes out of nowhere and no reason why her physical body is able to survive the space environment. But other than that it was really good. Looking forward to how they wrap up the series with IX. I know JJ won’t let us down.
